Current Question Text: Physical Activity - Flag for Current Status of Report Unread/Viewed/Declined
Notes: Should be nested under Secondary Source (Physical Activity). Notifications would go out on report status = unread along with pt not withdrawn/not deceased, and being verified. Not a default variable but default value is unread; This variable acts as a toggle that refects the current status; if the participant clicks View on the PWA it will set at Viewed, if they click Decline, it will set as Declined, and if they click View and then Decline, it will change from Viewed to Declined (and vice versa)
